thread.title: Excelent view, good service and great terrace bar
thread.title_full: Excelent view, good service and great terrace bar - Review of The Standard, High Line, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Alejandro E
title: Excelent view, good service and great terrace bar
text:
I went with my wife for our anniversary and had so much fun. We had reserved a Deluxe Queen room with harbor view. I upgraded this for a very convenient price.
Terrace bar is great. make a reservation to secure your entrance. No minimum consumption required.
Great location. Excellent restaurants and coffee shops nearby.
Room service was bad: they didn't know what was available from the menu. After ordering, they called me back saying they run out of the products.
Better to enjoy nearby top restaurants.
Room Tip: rooms facing Hudson river are simply incredible !!!! See more room tips
